import React, { useState } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import './home.css' const Home = () => { const [data,setdata]=useState((JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('datas')))) const handledelete=(index)=> { data.splice(index,1) setdata([...data]) } return (
AllScenarios

{data.map((data,i)=>(
))}
Vehicle Id Vehicle Name Position X Position Y Speed Direction Edit Delete
{1-i} {data.vname} {data.x} {data.y} {data.speed} {data.position}
) } export default Home
